titleStmt.title: A Full and true account of a bloody and barbarous murther, found to be committed upon the person of woman, in Kent-street, near St. George's Church, Southwark with the circumstances that attended the discovery, and other things accompanying so amazing and cruel proceedings.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sold by R. Janeway in Queens-Head-Alley in Pater- Noster-Row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
